text:
Interesting to see the amount of international coverage of this attempt by #Biolyse to use Canada's Access to Medicines Regime (#CAMR) for a #CompulsoryLicence  for J&J #COVID19 #vaccine.
Whether or not it works, though, #WTO #TRIPS #Article31bis won't solve the #pandemic.
🇨🇦💉🌐 https://t.co/ImGbfVx6hj
